LGS_CB2.AddClueDialog.Help.CtrlDrag.Titl: CTRL + Drag (GM Only for Blurring Actor/Custom/Placeholder):
LGS_CB2.AddClueDialog.Help.CtrlDrag.Desc: CTRL + Drag: Blurs image of actor.
• checked, uses name of actor for the name of the clue.
  • If unchecked (default), Clue name is 'Clue #{number}'.
This does not affect Actors dragged directly from the Actors Directory.
LGS_CB2.AddClueDialog.Help.Placeholder.D: Adds a generic clue image that can be replaced via the configuration cog for the clue.
